entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 08:38 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: ENE 28 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 late this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
